title: iPad air 2, red screen
message:
I have an ipad air 2 who make red screen after reboot like iPhone 5s.
I try to remove camera both, nothing change. I can't restore it because the screen come red in restore.
Do you have an idea please?
thanks

title: iPad air 2, red screen
message: sorry i'm not on the good forum :(. you can close

title: iPad air 2, red screen
message: Just as a thought, inspect home button. If cable is torn at all, it will cause red screen and reboot on Air 2.
